si.title: නව සභාපතිවරයා ශ්රී ලංකා ආයෝජන කවුන්සිලයට පත් කරන ලදී
body_lines: ඔහු ජ්යෙෂ් and කන්ද්රියකයෙකු හා ශ්රී ලංකාවේ උපදේශකයෙකු ලෙස සහ අර්නස්ට් සහ තරුණ මාලදිවයිනෙකු ලෙස සේවය කර ඇත.

en.title: New Chairman appointed to Sri Lanka Investment Council
body_lines: He has served as a senior partner and adviser to Sri Lanka and the Maldives of Ernst and Young.

summary_lines: Sri Lanka appoints new Chairman for Investment Council. He previously worked at Ernst & Young, serving as senior partner and advisor for both countries.
